extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Pro Mylocation plugin enables you to obtain the current coordinate location and send to others by SMS or GO Chat. So that you can tell your friends where you are conveniently.Main functions:- Built-in Google Maps SDK- Support obtaining the current exact coordinate location- Support displaying map preview in bubbles- Support viewing full-screen mapHow to install and use the Mylocation plug-in?1. To install and use the plug-in, please purchase the Premium Pack Service in GO SMS Pro application center first. After purchasing, click the Mylocation icon in the GO SMS Pro Application Center or the Premium Pack Service and follow the tips to download and install.2. You can send your current location to friends by SMS or GO Chat message in GO Share panel of conversation page.3. Suggest to enable the GPS or mobile network to help get an accurate coordinate.** Tips **- Mylocation plug-in needs to read your phone precise GPS permission.- Find Phone runs with GO SMS Pro v4.53 version or above.** Related website **- Download the newest GO SMS Pro: 1.Search âGO SMS Proâ in Google Play Market; 2.https://market.android.com/details?id=com.jb.gosms- Visit our Blog: http://gosms.goforandroid.com- Visit our official website: http://www.goforandroid.com- Email to us: gomessanger@gmail.com- Visit our facebook profile: http://www.facebook.com/apps/application.php?id=178919808825035Thank you very much for your support.

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: This plugin does make sharing location very easy directly from GO SMS. What it lacks is an option to allow location requests from contacts. Seeing as I had to pay for what so many other apps offer for free, I\'d like an option in the \'individual\' settings to allow certain contacts to send an SMS with a simple keyword that triggers GO SMS to automatically reply with my location. If that were added I\'d certainly rate at 5 stars.
reviews.author: Ryan Green

reviews.title: It worked for me
reviews.comment: I was hesitant to install after reading many poor reviews.   It worked for me (in English!), maybe only because I had already previously purchased the whole Go SMS Pro version.
reviews.author: Dulce Bautista

reviews.title: can\'t figure out how to use it
reviews.comment: So I made the mistake of paying for this, partly cause there was some other premium services that I thought could be useful.   I have been looking all through the app an can not find where I can share my location.
reviews.author: Dave Grillo

reviews.title: Love all that this SMS does
reviews.comment: There never seems to be an end to the amazingly useful plug-ins that have been released.  Absolutely love this app & will never consider switching... (except for updated Go SMS Pro.
reviews.author: Adam Marlar

reviews.title: Why pay?
reviews.comment: There\'s an app call GPS Share that does this for free and it work great.

reviews.title: PAY?? ZERO STARS
reviews.comment: No warning once free. Update makes u pay to use. Uninstalling All of the Go apps. Not worth it enough is enough

reviews.title: Cool idea...
reviews.comment: This is an awesome idea. I could see this being very helpful. Especially to people who really suck at directions or don\'t know their specific location. But i give it 3 stars due to the fact it didn\'t tell me i had to pay for it right away. If they would tell you in the beginning before actually downloading it that would be awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: but it\'s not free to get you location anymore.
